New Records: CJ McCollum scored 25 points, matching his career-high in the game

Herbert Jones made a significant defensive play late in the game
Post-Match Reflections: Willie Green emphasized the importance of the win in the Pelicans' playoff push
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was played at the Smoothie King Center
